title: How to Get Free N95 Masks From the U.S. Government
sub_head: Masks are available at some locations starting this week; program expected to be fully running by early February
body:
U.S. residents will soon be able to pick up free N95 masks. Some already can.
The first wave of 400 million free high-filtration masks provided by the Biden administration have shipped to participating pharmacies and community health centers, with more to follow. A limited number of masks are currently available, with more arriving in coming days, and the program will be fully up and running by early February, according to White House officials.
